issue.title: Min/Max surface is only checked on perimerter edit
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Min/Max surface is only checked on perimeter edit, not when a product is added to basket, nor before saving the basket/sending the order.

If a user has set a perimeter with a non limiter product, he can then add a limited product without verification.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.3
